=====================
Zendesk data pipeline
=====================

This documentation summarizes a data pipeline which sources data from Zendesk Support (customer service software featuring an email ticketing system) to BigQuery (Google Big Data platform).

Objectives
==========

* integrate information from Zendesk Support with the analytical datamart
* give analysts easy to use data structure containing information about tickets/incidents
* extend regular reporting with Zendesk Support KPIs

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Introduction

   self

    :maxdepth: 2
    :caption: Infrastructure + data pipeline
